Description: Mineral Park agreed to pay $1.3 million civil penalties in settlement of allegations its copper and molybdenum mine in Mohave County, Arizona was constructed without permits and committed multiple air quality violations.
Info Source: https://legacy.azdeq.gov/function/news/2012/download/052412.pdf
https://sec.nv.gov/uploads/mtg_0611/final_minutes_061611.pdf
Notes: Case presented to the Nevada State Environmental Commission, which approved the penalty.
